text: is a Japanese politician. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He was a member of the House of Representatives in the Diet from 1980 until 2012. He was the Minister of Transport from 1996 to 1997. Koga was born in Fukuoka, Japan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Fukuoka Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
title: Makoto Koga
